sentences.sContent: The fission of the cell could be inhibited with certain chemicals.
sentences.sContent_eng: The fission of the cell could be inhibited with certain chemicals.
sentences.sCn: 细胞的裂变可以通过某些化学药品加以抑制。

sentences.sContent: Essentially, all the neutrons and part of the gamma rays are emitted in the actual fission process .
sentences.sContent_eng: Essentially, all the neutrons and part of the gamma rays are emitted in the actual fission process .
sentences.sCn: 从根本上说，所有的中子和一部分射线都是在裂变实际的过程中放射出来的。

synos.tran: [核]裂变；[生物]分裂；分体；[细胞]分裂生殖法

words.tran: 可分裂的；可作核裂变的
分裂生殖的；有分裂倾向的
裂缝；裂沟（尤指岩石上的）

trans.tranOther: the process of splitting an atom to produce large amounts of energy or an explosion
